Institutional and scientific collaborations

  • Corpus dei Manoscritti Copti Letterari (Rome-Hamburg)

  • Trismegistos: An interdisciplinary portal of papirology and epigraphical resources (Leuven)

  • CSMC: Center for the Study of Manuscript Cultures (Hamburg)

  • Digital Edition and Translation of the Coptic-Sahidic Old Testament (Göttingen)

  • Museo Egizio (Turin)

  • The British Museum. Department of Ancient Egypt and Sudan (London) - Advisor for PAThs: dr. Elisabeth R. O’Connell.

  • Egyptological Library and Archives (Milan)

  • Beta maṣāḥǝft. Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung (Hamburg)

  • TraCES: From Translation to Creation: Changes in Ethiopic Style and Lexicon from Late Antiquity to the Middle Ages (Hamburg)

  • DigiLab (Rome) - Advisor for PAThs: dr. Lanfranco Fabriani

  • Cobb Institute of Archaeology. College of Arts & Sciences, Mississippi State University

  • Polish Centre of Mediterranean Archaeology of the University of Warsaw (PCMA) (Warsaw, Poland)

  • Bundesanstalt für Materialforschung und -prüfung (BAM)

Tracking Papyrus and Parchment Paths
An Archaeological Atlas of Coptic Literature

Literary Texts in their Geographical Context: Production, Copying, Usage, Dissemination and Preservation
